headline: GTA Online
subtitle: REINVENTING THE WHEELS
content:
Citizens of Los Santos know there’s only one way to age: Like a fine wine. A fine wine that’s been pumped full of formaldehyde and locked in resin. That’s why well-loved favorites have been given a facelift.

Find the Pegassi Zentorno, Benefactor Stirling GT, Grotti Turismo R, and much more with brand-new liveries in all your usual dealerships.
